properties.areaDesc: 5NM East of a line from Fairport MI to Rock Island Passage; Seul Choix Point to Point Detour MI
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 9 at 3:45PM EST until January 10 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Marquette MI
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Gale Warning, south winds 20 to 30 kt with
gusts up to 40 kt and waves 7 to 10 feet occurring. For the
Small Craft Advisory, west winds 10 to 20 kt with gusts up to
25 kt and waves 5 to 8 feet expected.

* WHERE...Seul Choix Point to Point Detour MI and 5NM East of a
line from Fairport MI to Rock Island Passage.

* WHEN...For the Gale Warning, until 1 AM EST Friday. For the
Small Craft Advisory, from 1 AM to 7 AM EST Friday.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds will cause hazardous waves which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should alter plans to avoid these hazardous conditions.
Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or secure the
vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: GALE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 AM EST FRIDAY... ...SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 7 AM EST FRIDAY
